p: Oil sample analysis was achieved on an Hp-6890 gas chromatograph equipped with an FID and a DB-5 capillary column, 30 m × 0.25 mm, 0.25 μm film thickness, temperature was programmed as follows: 60 °C −240 °C at 4 °C/ min. The carrier gas was N 2 at a flow of 2.0 ml/min; injector port and detector temperature were 250 °C and 300 °C, respectively. The sample was injected by splitting and the split ratio was 1:10.
